TopicTitle: Action groups & staging from map view.

Articles.Content:
Hi

Is there a mod (or stock setting that I completely missed) that allows action groups and staging to be activated while in the map view?

There is a mod that allows staging (I'm not sure about action groups I don't use them all that often), it's called [Alternate Resource Panel](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60227-). It's an oddish addition to a resource panel mod but it works well in both capacities.
